text:
{{!!title}} is the Novice-master for the [[Martial Temple of Dol Arrah]] in [[Starilaskur]], [[Breland]]. She is a [[paladin]] under the [[Oath of Devotion]]. She oversees the training, education, and discipline of the novices of the Martial Temple.

!! Appearance and Personality 

Wroenna is a woman with a powerful presence, standing at six feet tall. Notably, her heart literally glows so brightly it shines through her shirt. She is about thirty years of age and has a dark complexion. She is dedicated to the ideals of honor and compassion, and she never willingly tells a lie; however, she has a secret fondness for harmless pranks.
title: Wroenna Lonn
tags: Starilaskur humanoid [[Martial Temple of Dol Arrah]] paladin human
